beer.beer_description:
Cwrw Ysgawen/Elderflower Ale is a refreshing pale ale brewed from Welsh mountain water and natural ingredients.

Cascade hops are used for aroma, with the added indulgence of elderflowers, creating a superb floral bouquet and a delectable sweet citrus finish.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 20 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 5!

user.bio:
Pub Shed Landlord & Terrible Homebrewer

Beer is made from Hops.. Hops are Plants. 
Beer = Salad

items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 360 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 73. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 245 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 50!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 120 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 25!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 250 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 51.

items.checkin_comment:
Great, refreshing, light, and zesty. Nice.
#ThanksSanta

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 125 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 26!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 65 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 14!

While small, the brewing tradition of Wales is quite robust. As early as the 6th century the country began to form its very own distinct styles. That's 30 different beers from a brewery from Wales. Try 5 more for Level 7!

items.checkin_comment: Etwas zitroniger und blumiger Geruch. Geschmacklich sehr bitter und trocken mit einem Hauch Beere. Holunderaromen konnte ich leider nicht entdecken. Gutes Pale Ale
